properties.entry: select rownum, n.* from (select * from notice where save='N' order by create_date desc) n
select count(*) count from notice where save='Y'
select * from notice where save='N' and impt='Y' order by create_date desc
select * from (select rownum rnum, n.* from notice n where save='N' and impt='N' and title like '%'+?+'%' order by create_date desc) where rnum between ? and ?
select * from (select rownum rnum, n.* from notice n where save='N' and impt='N' and content like '%'+?+'%' order by create_date desc) where rnum between ? and ?
select * from (select rownum rnum, n.* from notice n where save='N' and impt='N' and (title like '%'+?+'%' || content like '%'+?+'%') order by create_date desc) where rnum between ? and ?
select n.* from (select rownum, * from notice where save='N') n where rownum=?
select n.* from (select rownum, * from notice where save='Y') n where rownum=?
update notice set title=?, content=?, create_date=sysdate ,save=?, impt=? where notice_no=?
insert into notice(notice_no, title, content, save, impt) values('N'||lpad(seq_notice.nextval,4,0), ?, ?, ?, ?)
